config.apiMethod.getUserStatus: GET_USER_STATUS - Full quota info via local API
config.apiMethod.googleApi: GOOGLE_API - Fetch quota via Google Cloud Code API (requires login)
config.forcePowerShell: Use PowerShell mode for process detection [Windows only, requires extension restart]
config.autoSwitchAccount: Automatically switch to another account when quota is low
config.switchThreshold: Quota threshold (%) to trigger automatic account switching
